quoteText: Furthermore, users can prevent the collection of data about their use of the website (including their IP address) generated by the cookie, and the processing of data by Google, by downloading and installing the browser plug-in through the following link: http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=en.
title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
